Package org.drip.analytics.daycount

Class DCAct_Act_UST

java.lang.Object
org.drip.analytics.daycount.DCAct_Act_UST
All Implemented Interfaces:
DCFCalculator
public class DCAct_Act_UST
extends java.lang.Object
implements DCFCalculator
DCAct_Act_UST implements the US Treasury Bond Act/Act Day Count Convention.

  • Module = Product Core Module
  • Library = Fixed Income Analytics
  • Project = Date, Cash Flow, and Cash Flow Period Measure Generation Utilities
  • Package = Day Count Year Fraction Utilities
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
